11.content: Back to the beginning huh? Alright, which Ranger are you?
11.title: Season 1

113.content:
Today started out just like every other day for you. Wake up, get breakfast, and go to martial arts practice. That's right, you are an aspiring martial artist. You train day in and day

out in order to be the best and hope to one day be able to prove that you are. You hold black belts in several different styles and no amount of skill or prowess is enough for you.

Why do you have this drive though? What causes you to show such fierce determination? A look back at the television at the front of the dojo (training hall) would answer that. The

news was on and the top story was once again about-..."The Power Rangers have once again saved the day" said the news anchor man. "That's right Jeff" replied the anchor woman.

"They have once again brought down an evil monster bent on destroying Angel Grove". "One thing is for sure Candice" said the anchorman. "The Power Rangers will always be

around to save the day". "It sure seems that way Jeff, it looks like there's no one out there stronger than the Power Rangers-" *CLICK* You turned off the T.V. and walked across the

empty dojo to the heavy bags. "No one out there stronger than the Power Rangers huh"? You retort as you wail on the heavy bag. "Well see about that" you say with determination

in your voice. "When the time comes, I'll prove that I'm the strongest, KIYAH"! You yell as the heavy bag busts open and begins pouring sand everywhere from the force of your

punch. "Someday...." you say as you grab your tote bag and head out the door to go home.
113.title: Your story begins

1132.content:
At Rita's Palace on the moon...."Damn those blasted Rangers"! Rita yelled. "Every time, every SINGLE time"! "Do not fret empress" replied Goldar. "We will destroy them for

sure next time"! "Shut it Goldar"! She retorted. "It's obvious to me that you are incapable of handling those pesky Rangers on your own"! "B-but, my Queen-" "SILENCE"! Rita

yelled as she stomped away. "Boy Goldar, you sure made Rita mad this time" said Squatt. "Yeah, I've never seen her this fumed" replied Baboo. "GGGRRR...." Goldar growled

as he stared

down the two numb skulls. "YIKES"! They both yelled in unison as they ran. Rita was walking through one of the passageways of the castle when she saw one of the rooms

glowing green. 'What the hell is that' she thought as she walked to the room. Upon entry she saw a glowing green power coin like one of the Power Rangers'. "GASP"! She

exclaimed. 'Has the time finally come'. She grabbed the power coin and hurriedly made her way back to the lookout post. Finster saw the glowing coin in his mistress' hand.

"What might that be your highness"? He inquired. "If my hunch is correct, then it's the answer to our Power Ranger problem" she replied. "I'm just curious to see what kind of

host the power coin has chosen to become the new Green Ranger" Rita continued as she began to look through her telescope with great interest. The telescope began to focus

in on Angel Grove, then on an individual. "Yes"! She exclaimed, "It's coming into focus". Then finally you came into focus on the telescope. Wearing your white gi (martial arts

uniform) black belt around your waist, and kanji (Japanese writing) that read "Death" on the back of your gi top. "Ooohhh" she said with earnest as she continued to look through

the telescope. Seeing your short blonde hair, bright blue eyes, and muscularly defined body. "My, he certain LOOKS like he meets the qualifications" said Rita. "Finster"! She

yelled. "Yes your majesty"? He replied. "Send down the Putty Patrol, I think we should test our new candidate". She said, smiling wickedly. "Yes ma'am" said Finster as he fired

up the monster making machine. "I think I'll go as well and enjoy the show". Rita said with a sneer.
1132.title: Rita's Evil Plot

11321.content:
At this point you were in the middle of walking home. You turned down an alley, it was the normal

shortcut you took to get home quicker. When you were halfway down the alleyway you were suddenly

surrounded by six gray looking men with ugly faces. They continued to jump around, wave their arms

about and yell. "Hmph"! Is all you say as you drop your tote bag to the ground and crack your

knuckles. "I've seen you guys before" you say. "Your the guys I've seen attacking the Power Rangers".

"Unfortunately for you guys" you continue as you begin cracking your neck on one side, then the other,

"I'm not as forgiving as the Power Rangers" you say raising a fist to them. "A fight with me" you say as

you take a fighting stance, "is a fight to the DEATH"! You yell as you charge one of the putties.

"KYAH"! The putty was caught off guard as you give him an uppercut, sending flying a few feet back.

Two more try to charge you from behind, but you see it coming and grab both of them by the neck and

immediately slam their heads into one another. They both flop on the ground as another putty comes up

from behind and grabs you in a bear hug. Then another one comes at you with a flying kick. However,

you duck just in time and the putty ends up kicking the other putty who had you in a bear hug, breaking

his hold. You tuck and roll and turn to face the putty. The putty turns around in time to see your fist

flying at him. "AYA"! You yell as your fist punches through the putty's chest. He collapses on the

ground and evaporates into a pile of gray goop. You turn to face the rest of the putties. "So, who's

next"? You say, blowing the gray dust from your knuckles. The five remaining putties take a step back

and look at each other nervously. Never before have they fought someone so tenacious and merciless.

"Alright then" you say. "If you won't come to me...then I'll come you"! You charge at the putties.

"KYAH"! You kicked one of the putties heads clean off. He falls to the ground in a pile of goop just as

the other had. Before the rest of them had time to react you swung around giving one of them a back

fist to the head, again knocking it clean off. He too collapses into a pile pf gray goo. "Heh, the way the

Power Rangers fight you guys I would've thought you were tougher than this" you say arrogantly. The

remaining three putties look at each other and nod. Then suddenly, they all charge at you. "Bring it"

you say as you charge them as well. You jump in the air to perform a drop kick and kick both the

putties on the left and right at the same time. Knocking both of their heads off. They both fall and turn

to goo as you flip back and land on your feet. The last putty looks at you obviously scared as he scoots

back against the wall of the building behind him. "What's the matter"? You say condescendingly,

"You're the ones that challenged ME! And now that you're losing it's no fun anymore". You continue to

walk slowly towards him. The putty waves his arms at you in a plea for you spare him. "I don't think so"

you say grabbing him by the neck and lifting him off his feet. You're going to have to finish what you

started" you say giving him a stern look. You raise your other fist and pull it back as you prepare to

finish him. "Goodbye" you say in a monotone voice as you thrust your punch forward and punch clean

through his head. He then finally collapses into a pile of goop just as the rest did. "That wasn't nearly as

hard as the Rangers make it look" you say to yourself. "Your perfect"! you hear a feminine voice yell as

a mighty wind suddenly erupts. You then see a peculiarly dressed woman floating down from the sky

with a big wand in hand. "Who might you be"? You ask inquisitively. "I am Rita Repulsa, Queen of

Darkness and future ruler of this world" she says with a curtsy. "Interesting" you reply looking her up

and down. "Whoever you are, you're certainly easy on the eyes" grabbing her hand and kissing it.

"Why thank you" she says. "Am I safe in assuming your the one that sent those putties after me"? You

ask. "Yes" she replies. "But don't get the wrong idea, I was merely testing you, and you passed with

flying colors my boy". "Why were you testing me exactly"? "To see if you were worthy of this..." Said

Rita pulling out the Green Power Coin. "And what's that"? You ask. "The key to the power of the Green

Ranger"! She replied showing it to you. Your eyes go wide realizing what it was. You look at it intently

as if it were calling to you. "I've seen the way you fight" said Rita. "I've seen your drive, your

determination, and your tenacity. Your the perfect candidate to become the new Green Ranger"! She

exclaims. Your eyes begin to glow green as you react to the coin. You then shake your head "Wait a

minute. What's in it for me"? You inquire. "Ah, thinking of the benefits huh"? Said Rita "I like that.

Well first off, you'll be a driving force in my conquering of the world and get a grand spot in my new

world order...and...." she leaned in closer as to whisper in your ear. "You'll get....to fight....the Power

Rangers". That last part caught your attention as flashbacks of what you had said earlier today rushed

into your mind 'I'll prove I'm the strongest' rung in your head. "You mean it"? You ask. "I'll get to test

my strength against the one and only Power Rangers"? "But of course" she replied "I want you to be

able to prove that you are the strongest fighter in the world" she said as if she could read your mind.

"So what do you say? Will you become MY Power Ranger"? She asked seductively.
11321.title: Rita's Test

113211.content:
“Hmmmm” you think about it for a moment weighing the pros and cons of the situation. 'On the one

hand, the power I've always wanted is finally within my grasp' you think. 'However, I'm not entirely

sure I can trust this woman and she IS trying to take over the world and I don't know if I can support

that'. You continue to contemplate until you come to a decision. You look to her smiling and say “Yes!

If it means the chance to prove I'm the strongest, then yes, I will”. “Hahahahaha”! She laughs smiling

wickedly. “Excellent choice” “So, how does this work? Do you say some sort of magic word or

something”? You ask. “Simply take the Power Coin in your hand and let the power take you” she

explained handing you the coin. “Sounds simple enough” you reply taking the coin. You close your

eyes and grip the power coin firmly in your hand. Green sparks begin to shoot out from the coin and a

green light envelops you. “GRRAAAHHHH”! You yell as you feel your newly endowed powers come

rushing through every fiber of your being. Rita looks on with earnest to see your final transformation.

“Yes, YES, accept the power and become MY new Green Ranger”! She exclaims. Finally with sound

like the crackling of thunder, FWOOM! The transformation was complete. You open you eyes to see

you are now in a green spandex suit, a golden chest plate strapped over your chest, white gloves and

boots, and a green protective helmet on your head. You look to your hand to see that the coin is no

longer there. You look down to your waist to see it is now embedded in your belt buckle, you then see a

green dagger in a holster on the side of your belt. “This...is....AMAZING”! You exclaim looking at

your hands as you clench them into fists. “I could accomplish anything with this power, HHAAAA”!

You roar as you raise your fists to the air and green lightning sparks from your body. “And you fill out

the suit rather well” said Rita looking at your butt. “Now my Green Ranger, I shall draw the Power

Rangers out of hiding. Go and prepare yourself for the challenge you've been so desperately seeking”.

“Yes, my Queen” you say with an evil smirk. Rita teleports back to her castle. “Goldar”! She yells.

“Yes Empress” he replied bowing. Go down to Angel Grove and have some fun. Yes my Queen,

HAHAHA”! He said cackling as he flew down to Earth.
113211.title: The New Green Ranger!

1132111.content:
(At the Power Rangers Command Center.......)

Zordon flashes into his cylinder. “Alpha, come quickly. I sense a major disturbance in the balance

between good and evil on Earth. “Aiyaiyaiyaiyai”! Said the overzealous robot. “What could it possibly

be Zordon”?! Alpha inquired frantically. “It's hard to describe Alpha, but I fear the worst. Contact the

Rangers, I must warn the-” WHOOP WHOOP WHOOP! Rang the alarm interrupting Zordon. “Zordon!

Look at the viewing globe”! Yelled Alpha. “Goldar's attacking Angel Grove! Aiyaiyaiyai”! “Contact

the Rangers immediately Alpha, the disturbance I felt will just have to wait. “You got it Zordon, they'll

give Goldar what for”! He said while typing on one of the control pads.


(In Angel Grove)

Riiiiiiiiinnnnnggg

Rang the school's fire alarm as all the student's were being evacuated due to Goldar's attack on Angel

Grove. Jason and the other Rangers rushed behind the school as they heard their communicators go off.

“Alpha come in, what's going on”? Asked Jason. “It's Goldar”! Replied the robot. “Hurry, you guys

gotta stop him or there won't be an Angel Grove left to save”! “You got it Alpha”! Jason replied. “IT”S

MORPHIN' TIME”! They all raised their Morphers to the sky. “Mastodon”! yelled Zach.

“Pterodactyl”! Yelled Kimberly. “Triceratops”! Yelled Billy. “Saber-tooth Tiger”! Yelled Trini.

“Tyrannosaurus” Yelled Jason. They instantly morphed into their Power Ranger forms and were

teleported to where Goldar was causing destruction. “AYA”! They all exclaimed as they took fighting

stances. “Well well well, if isn't my LEAST favorite group of people” Goldar sneered. “Let's do this

Goldar, we're ready” said Zach. “As much as I would like the pleasure of crushing you myself” replied

Goldar. “I'm afraid you won't be getting the privilege of fighting me today”. “Alright then lemme

guess” said Kimberly. “Rita's got some lame monster waiting on the sidelines”? “Yeah c'mon, who's

Rita got lined up for us this time” Trini asked folding her arms. “That....would be me” you say smugly

from behind them. They all turn in surprise, taking defensive stances. But once they get a good look at

you they are taken aback. “What is this, some kind of joke”? Asked Jason. “Most illogical” Billy

added. “Afraid not” you reply. “I'm the real deal. The one and only Green Ranger”! You exclaim. “And

I'm ten times the Ranger any of you could ever be” you add walking down to face them. “But if your a

Ranger, then why are you attacking us”? Asked Zach. “Because my Empress Rita wishes me to” you

say taking a fighting stance. “And I figure if anyone can give me a decent challenge it's the Power

Rangers”. “Alright then, get ready green bean” said Jason as he and the other Rangers took fighting

stances as well. “This is gonna be good” said Goldar with an evil grin.
1132111.title: The Calm Before the Storm

11321112.content:
“Heh, I can tell just by looking at you guys” you say. “You can't beat me”. “Only one way to find out”

says Jason. “And just to keep things interesting” you say as you pull your dagger from it's holster. You

then stick it into the ground. “You're not even gonna use your weapon”? Jason asks in disbelief. “Don't

have to” you reply arrogantly. Jason gives you an angry look. “Power Rangers charge”! He yells as he

and the other Rangers charge at you ready for battle. You take a defensive stance, readying yourself for

their attack. They all come in at you from different directions with a wide array of different punches,

strikes, and kicks. You however, avoid all of their attacks with ease, dodging every blow. On the moon

at Rita's palace, she watches your battle with great interest. “This is great, with any luck my strong and

handsome Green Ranger will rid me of those pesky do gooders once and for all”. “Yeah, I just wish we

had some popcorn to enjoy the sh-.......Wait.....what did you call him”? Asked Squatt. “Um, strong”

Rita said hesitantly. “After that” said Baboo. “None of your business”! She yelled as she turned back to

resume looking through her telescope at the battle below. “YAWN” you say nonchalantly as the

Rangers continue their assault. “Guess it's time for me to go on the offensive”. You turn to face Billy

the Blue Ranger since he was the closest to you at the moment. “Lights out, AYA”! You yell striking

him with a two-handed strike combination to the gut and the face, which sends him flying back several

feet in a heap. “Billy”! Exclaimed Zach the Black Ranger. “you'll pay for that one, TAKE THIS”! He

yells running and jumping in the air to perform a flying side kick. But before he connects with it, you

grab him by his kicking leg with both hands. “I don't think so, but whaddya say I take ya for a spin”

you say as you begin spinning Zach in circles fiercely. Increasing speed and momentum you release

him, sending him flying through a brick wall with a CRASH! “Oh no! Zach”! Yelled Trini. “Cover me

Kim, so I can get in close” she said pulling out her sai. “You got it” said Kimberly pulling out her bow.

Trini rushed at you as Kim began firing energy arrows at you. However, PING PING PING! They all

reflected off your golden chest plate with ease. “Hehe, nice try Pinky. Let's see how you handle this”.

You say as you rush at Trini, catching her by surprise with your amazing speed. “GWAH”! She screams

as you clothesline her and secure her in a headlock. You continue your assault running at Kimberly

with Trini still in your headlock. You close in and grab Kimberly by the throat. “GAH”! She yells in

shock. You lift both her and Trini off the ground by their necks. “Don't worry ladies” you say

sarcastically. “There's plenty of me to go around”. You then throw them both into the air, jump up and

WHAM! You knee both of them in the face sending both of them soaring into the air even higher. You

land perfectly and see both of them collapse on the ground unconscious. You then turn around and see

both Zach and Billy were unconscious as well. “Well Red, looks like it's just you and me” you say

smirking. “He's doing it! He's ACTUALLY doing it”! Cheered Rita as she continued to look through

her telescope. “Yeah! Go Green Ranger! Go Green Ranger”! Cheered Squatt and Baboo waving

pompoms. “You won't get away with this”! Yelled Jason clenching his fist in anger. “You think so

huh”? You say calmly. “ well if you think you can beat with THAT pitiful power level you're sadly

mistaken. But if you think you can, come prove it” you say motioning for him to attack you.

“AARRRGH”! Yelled Jason rushing at you sword in hand in a blind rage. He swings the blade at your

head and CHING! You easily catch the blade between your thumb and index fingers. Jason still

struggling to push the blade down on you says “You will pay” with anger in his voice. “I don't think so”

you reply smugly and SNAP! You snap his blade in two with your fingers. He takes a few steps back in

aw of your power. “Allow me to take this opportunity to properly introduce myself” you say as you

slowly remove your helmet. “I'm Ryan, Ryan Cordaine” you say bowing. “And as for you, well” you

continue as you raise your open hand aiming at Jason's chest. “your history” you say with a smirk.

Green energy begins to form in your hand as lightning starts crackling around it. “KYA”! You yell as

the energy blast bursts from your hand and makes a direct hit sending Jason flying back twenty feet and

skidding along the pavement. You walk across the battlefield and stand over him. He groggily looks up

at you, chest smoking, about to pass out himself from the impact of your last attack. “W-what ARE

you”? He asks fearing for his life and the lives of his friends. You look down at him and simply state as

you aim your hand at him “I'm the Green Ranger.....BITCH”! Energy begins to form in your hand again

for your final attack. “ALPHA! Quickly teleport the Rangers back to the Command Center before it's

too late”! Said Zordon. “You got it Zordon”! The robot exclaimed as he pressed a few keys on the

computer. Back at the battlefield you say “Goodbye, KIYA”! You yell as you fire another energy blast,

but just as it was about to connect, Jason and the other Rangers vanished in flashing lights of their

respective colors. You look around to see that they were all gone. “Hey Goldar”! You yell. “What the

hell happened”? You say confused. “It must have been that meddling Zordon”! He yelled in anger. You

walk across the battlefield and pick up your helmet. “Whatever the case, let's get back to Empress Rita

and figure this out” you say as you and Goldar are enveloped in a green light and are teleported back to

Rita's palace.
11321112.title: Ranger Battle Royale!

113211121.content:
A loud FWOOM is heard throughout the Command Center as the Power Rangers return and from the

looks of it, they didn't look too well. "Alpha" said Zordon. "Quickly, get them to the medical bay".

"You got it Zordon. Hang in there Rangers, we'll get you patched up in no time. Aiyaiyai" replied Alpha

as he quickly distributed them to the medical bay to begin treatment. A few hours later, after everyone

regained consciousness, they all returned to the main room of the Command Center so that Zordon

could explain. "Zordon" Jason began. "What the heck happened back there? That guy was a ranger

right? So why's he working for Rita"? He asked. Zordon went on to explain to everyone about how Rita

came to you with the power coin and how you accepted, not knowing you would be put under Rita's

evil influence. "I get all that" said Kimberly. "I just don't get how he was able to take on all five of us

without breaking a sweat". "Yeah" said Trini. "He didn't even look like he was trying". He told me his

name before he blasted me" said Jason. "What was it"? Asked Billy. "He said it was....Ryan...Cordaine I

think”. “Oh boy” said Zach. “What, you know that name”? Asked Jason. “Yeah” replied Zach. He's a

martial arts teacher at the dojo across the street from the dance studio. I've seen him in action, he's one

bad mamma jamma”. “It would seem the Green Ranger's power has amplified this already talented

young man's great strength to a degree higher than that of a normal Ranger” said Zordon. “This is a

most unprecedented situation. What should be done to rectify this problematic error”? Asked Billy is

his usual techno babble. “You must learn more about this young man” said Zordon. “He knows not

your identities, discover something that you might be able to use to your advantage next time you

meet”. “Great idea Zordon” said Jason. “Let's move out Rangers” he said as they were teleported back

to Angel Grove.
113211121.title: At the Command Center

114.content: You a guy or a chick? What? Colour doesn't choose gender. =3
114.title: Black Ranger

choices: "Adam, honest and strong, the Stegosaurus dino-zord will follow your commands."
"John, you are clever and brave, you shall command the Mastodon dino-zord."
"Bianca, kind and generous, the Pachycephalosaurus-zord will be at your side."
1141.content:
Okay, so you're a normal student at Angel Grove, at the Juice bar, you're sat by yourself, trying to mingle since you just transferred here. You're making good impressions, when suddenly an earthquake hits the city!!! You of course try to help some people out before taking off yourself, you notice four others, who you remember from role-call in class; Jason, Kimberly, Trinny and Billy. Wondering what they're doing, you run over and try to help-whoa what!? you can't move either!!! Suddenly a wierd feeling comes over you as you seem to raise up through the roof...but you don't feel anything and don't damage the roof as you burst off into the distance, following red, pink, yellow and blue lights.
Eventually you land in the middle of the dessert, no sign of the lights anymore, suddenly strange grey humanoid creatures come out of nowhere and surround you...luckily you know a bit of Karate and start taking them out, but there seems to be an infinite amount of them! *huff* *puff* You need some back-up...
"Hiya!"
"Hoo-ah!"
"Aiya!" Suddenly *insert appearance of the power rangers here* come out of nowhere and save you.
"That Zordon was right, the transfer student was out here and in danger..." The one in Red exclaimed.
"I think we owe him an apology..." The one in yellow added.
"We should take him along too, he did say he's the fifth ranger." After a ranger short walk you end up within a strange building, looking ancient on the outside, but very-high tech on the outside.
"Oh thank goodness he's alright." A strange robot stated as you walked by.
"I'm Alpha-five, and this is-" You look up to the huge head inside what looks like a lava lamp.
"Greetings, I am Zordon, an ancient evil has been awakened, known as Rita, and you and your other friends must become the power rangers to save earth." Suddenly a wierd belt buckle appears at your waist.
1141.title: I'm a dude.

11411.content:
"Um...what IS a power ranger?" You ask, very confused as to what's going on.
"Warriors devoted to protecting the world from great evil, putting themselves on the front lives to save countless others." Zordon explains.
"You ready Adam? Just do as we do. It's morphing time!" Jason shouts, but before he can continue suddenly-
"Stegosaurus!" You cut ahead of him, as if it were a natural reflex. Suddenly you feel a huge amount of energy build up inside you, a black armour-suit similar to the others' fall upon you, a helmet looking like a lizards head, with huge spines going over it like a stegosaurus...and continuing down your back! Luckily they're not as big as you'd think.
"...Zordon what happened? His suit is different from ours..." Jason asks as Zordon looks down in amazement.
"He has been chosen as an S-list ranger, his suit now gives him certain powers, and because he is of the stegosaurus, he has increased endurance during battle. But now's not the time to go into great detail, you must go before Angel Grove is destroyed!" Before anyone can reply, you are whooshed up into the air again and are racing back to Angel Grove.
"Where're we going?" Kimberly asks.
"To save the world!" Jason replies.
Before long you're in the streets, huge amounts of the strange creatures again attacking innocent civilians.
"Putties!" Trinni exclaims.
"Okay guys, we need to focus on taking out these guys-"
"And saving the civilians." You add.
"Good call, we would'nt be heroes if we didn't save anyone right?" Billy backs you up.
"Let's go guys!" Everyone moves out, taking out groups of putties like nothing.
"They're nothing compared to us!" Jason exclaims out of confidence.
"Oh my god!" Trinni shouts as she points over to a pram, up above on a building, a strange creature that looks like a Golem is about to drop down a taxi onto the pram.
"Try and save this child rangers, bwabwabwabwa!" The Golem mocks the rangers as it drops the taxi.
"Not on my watch!" You shout as you run over and jump into the path of the taxi, you think that this will hurt like mad...but instead the taxi bounces off your back like rubber.
"Oh my baby! Th-thank you! Thank you!" The mother repeats herself, running over and taking out her baby before running off.
"That was real heroic off you Adam..." Trinni compliments you, affection in her voice.
"Good job man!" Jason adds, giving you a slap on the arm as everyone else runs over.
"Bwabwabwa! No way, nobody is more sturdy than me!" The Golem jumps down, causing an earthquake as he lands.
"Whoa-whoaaaaaaa! This guy must be causing the earthquakes!" Kimberly states as the group almost falls over.
"Bwabwabwa, now for the first and final strike spike-boy!" The Golem charges at you as the other jump out of the way.
"Watch out!" Billy shouts at you, but all you do is hold out your palm, catching the punch.
"Ngh! Nggggggghffff! Bwhat is this!?" The Golem whines as he tries to push you back.
"Evil begone!" You throw the Golem back into the wall in front of you.
"Bwaaaaaaah!" *THWATOH!* "Ohhhh..." The Golem wobbles about as it gets up while the others gather round you.
"All right!"
"You're on a roll!"
"Bwabwa...behhhh...I don't get...this..."
Meanwhile at Rita's moonbase.
"Gaaaahhhh! Why is that ranger more powerful than my Golem!?" Rita whines while a shadowy figure in the background shakes it's head.
"Mistress, why not just make it bigger? It'll crush him no matter how hard his back is."
"Aha! Of course, Magic Wand, make my monster grow!" As Rita throw her wand down to earth, the Golem grows to Titan size.
"BWAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHAHAHAHAHA!!! Try to stop me now spike-boy." You look up at the towering monster but try to stay strong.
"...looks like we need Dinosaur power...um...come Stegosaurus!" Suddenly from outside the city, Stegosaurus, black body, trimmed silver with glowing purple eyes and spines, comes running into the city.
"Whoa, that's a zord?" Kimberly asks as everyone looks up at your zord.
"Okay...guess I have to jump?" You jump up at the zord as the same power that zoomed you to the desert sends you into the cockpit of your zord.
"Stegosaurus zord, take him out!" At your command, Stegosaurus charges at the Golem knocking it into the ground.
"I'll lend you a hand man! Come on, we need dinosaur power now!" Jason shouted as the Tyrannosaurus zord comes running into the city, Jason jumps into it as Tyranno zord walks up to Stegosaurus zord.
"I have an idea, Jason, can you swing us into that thing?"
"Alright, hope you know what you're doing man...let's do this! Go Tyrannosaurus!"
"Adam, if you can get Stegosaurus to curl up as it flies into that rock creature it's spines will deal critical damage." Billy suggested as Tyrannosaurus grabbed a hold of Stegosaurus' tail.
"Got it, okay ready? Go, Prehistoric Punt!" Tyrannosaurus swinged Stegosaurus around, letting go at full speed, Stegosaurus is launched at the Golem as it curls up into a spiky ball.
"Bwaaaaaaagh! No! I only just started causing-auggggggggggh!" Stegosaurus sends the Golem flying, sparks coming out of it. Tyrannosaurus and Stegosaurus pose as the Golem explodes in the background.

Later de-morphed and back at the juice bar, everyone is watching the news.

"Goldar! Where's that talisman?!" The stout, shrieking witch shouted.

"Here, my queen. This talisman has been in your collection for millenia. What possible use could it be?" The wolf-faced monster in gold armor croaked.

"Idiot! I asked for the talisman, not your opinion! But, since you asked, This talisman will be my key to Zordon's undoing! It not only will make sure a different teen is teleported, it will forever imprint the child with a trait that will ultimately render whatever team Zordon creates into nothing but a gang of rowdy teenagers!"

Rita wasted no time and flung the talisman toward Earth. Just as Alpha sent the signal to bring the teens in, the talisman worked its magic! In your surprise, you let out a yelp and clasp your hands to your face, causing your towel to drop tot he floor. As your eyes adjust, you see it's your new friends! All of you realize you're standing there naked in front of them, and you finally try to cover yourself.

"You're not a secret nudist, are you?" Kim jokes.

"I'm sorry. I didn't mean to..." You squeak out, trying to reach for the towel.

"Leave it, it's fine. We've seen all of you already. When we were teleported back here, we wanted to do something special for you to say that you're one of us. I was hoping that it would give you a chance to get to know us with your clothes on, but it seems that's out of the question now." Jason explained, holding up a pizza.

"Wow guys, I'm...this is so unexpected!" You beam with joy.

"We can do this another time if you're uncomfortable." Jason offered.

You mull it over before deciding.

"To hell with it. If we're gonna be fighting side by side from now on, you're gonna see a lot of me anyways!" you say.

You join in a group hug and dig into the pizza, relaxing after a very strange day. Yet, unknown to all of you, it's just about to get weirder.

"Ahh! My talisman worked! That girl is going to be exposed so much, she might as well be a nudist!" Rita shouted, looking through a telescope from her castle on the moon.

"Are we ready for phase two, my Queen?" Goldar asked.

"Yes! Make sure my Ranger is ready to be deployed ASAP!!" she ordered.

Goldar left and went to the laboratory, where on the slab was a pulsing green form in the vague shape of a human. A Power Coin was mounted on a stand in the corner, beaming its light onto the humanoid. Goldar walked over to look things over.

"Good, this evil Green Ranger will prove no match for Zordon's Rangers." he said.

"Goldar!! Is my Ranger ready yet?" Rita shouted from the hall.

Goldar replied: "Almost my Queen...

14223.content: Congratulations you are the 7th ranger: the black samurai ranger! Your name is Brevin Vice and your good friends with jayden and Antonio, the red and gold samurai rangers. your 17, you have not seen your friends since you were nine. you have been in china studying martial arts, you are a master in 3 styles of kung fu. you used wolf, bat and horse style, to befit your zords. These zords and their disc where going away presents from jayden, Antonio, and your first sensei. you got them back plus your new morpher when you were ready to return to the states. you had just gotten your bags and made sure your stuff was all there for you had made a list. you had two copies of said list, one english the other japanese, you had learned the language from your teachers, as well as how to use a sword. you took a taxi to get to the dojo. when you got there you saw 4 unfamiliar faces. by eavesdropping you learned the blonde Swedish guy was Tyler the green ranger. the dark haired Australian guy was Donny the blue ranger. the brunette farm girl was Lilly the pink ranger. And lastly Jonie the blonde was the yellow ranger. you then saw jayden and Antonio in full armor walk out with sensei yelling about a nighlok alert. you smiled, this was your chance to surprise them. while the others morphed and ran, you walked up to sensei and told him who you where. of course sensei was glad to see you and said you should join the others against the nighlok attack. " yes sensei", you said. you ran onto the street and pulled your morpher. " its morphin' time" you shouted. then you where clothed in a plack uniform the the symbol for darkness on your mask. you ran to the fight, and got there just as a goon was sneakin up on jayden. No, you thought, pulling explosion symbol power to attack the goon. It shot out like a rocket and then...
14223.title: black ranger

142232.content:
You didn't hit the mooger but jaden beat it off easily. Instead the shot hit what looked like a tree until it turned threw seeds at you which made more moogers, which the others except for jay and Antonio went to fight. One weakness you always had wrote to sensei and your friends about was, you cant use your symbol power without physically draining your self a bit. You spent hours trying to beat that weakness, and always woke up in your room. Jaden and Antonio rushed to your side as soon as they recognized your black symbol power. 'Brevin, you OK me amigo?', Antonio asked. 'I'm fine, really'.
'No your not, morphing and explosion you used symbol twice', jaden said. 'Plus, I actually used super speed to get from, the airport to the dojo, then used the last of it to get to the fight', you said meekly. '3 times?!? How are you still on your feet?', jaden asked. 'I've gotten stronger since my last letter to you guys', you explained. Meanwhile the tree monster was making more and more moogers. 'Jaden have the others move, I have a plan', jaden seemed uneasy at first but you gave him a thumbs up, and he nodded pushing a comm button on his mask and mumbling a fallback and regroup command. Four bright flashes later the others were behind you as well, and jaden did a round of introductions. You then took your morphed and put up a symbol power you developed in japan. A wave of energy, picking up degree and starting fires and small earthquakes had appeared and all that was heard was screaming and breaking bones. After it was over as you thought there was charred earth, blood and bones everywhere and fires. The other rangers seemed terrified,'glad you moved now huh?', you said. 'I call it 'Vince wipeout', cool right?' Then small tremors came out of nowhere, 'we have bigger problems' jaden said. Then the tree nighlok appeared as a giant. 'Time for mega mode power', jaden said. As they each picked a zord you chose yours it was..
142232.title: Team effort

1422321.content:
'Let's cut this tree down', you said bravely,'mega mode power, unleash the wolf.' You stood proudley inside your zord, ' lefts rock wolf-zord', you said. The nighlok seemed, interested in you but ignored the others, who formed a mega-zord together and were obviousley confused that, the tree was ignoring them. But you understood completely, you called jaden,' J you thinking what I'm thinking?' 'Unfortunately, I think I am, he wants to test your strength for xandred, so he will ignore us completely.' 'Stand down guys', you said hearing protest followed by jaden encouraging words, everyone wished you luck, then the megazord dissapeared. 'So, it is down to you, and it is down to I, Treebora!', the nighlok roared. You needed an attack plan, and you knew it. Then an interesting idea came to mind, it would help since you were basically on your own. 'Wolf-zord, converge!', you say defiantley, the machine changed shape, taking a more human stance. 'Wolf-zord, beast warrior mode!', you were not done though. 'Bat-zord converge!', your bat companion, to your enemies surprise, turned into a sword with a glowing blue blade. 'But let me guess, you want me at my current best right Treebora?', you asked. The nighlok nodded slowly, very slowly. 'Right then, wake up horse-zord!', you shout, the warrior wolf-zord climbed atop the horse sword held high. 'Behold, I present to you the wild-heart samurai trimegazord', you say proudly. 'Let us begin ranger!', Treebora roared, charging at you. You charged back, sword to a point, then you jump over the nighlok, turn around and slash across his back. You smile until, the mark healed! 'Ha, fool a sword like that is useless against me', Treebora said, he then grabbed your sword and snapped it in half. Then he trashed the horse zord, from right under you. The wolf-zord fell to the ground, and turned to normal mode. You held your other zords in your hand, they needed rest. 'Come on Brevin think, he's gotta have a weakness. My sword didn't work, so that's out. He's a plant nighlok, he has immense strength, wait! That's it he's a plant', you say most triumphantley. The other rangers watched, as Treebora moved in for the final blow. A bright light then surged throughout the area, blinding the nighlok, you stood strong knowing you had him beat. Using symbol power, the wolf-zord was blessed with the power of fire. You attacked the nighlok leaving scratches that burned, and did not heal. 'No, impossible', Treebora roared as you attacked him more and more. 'One more hit, and your done Treebora', you said to the charred nighlok. 'Who are you?', he said weakley. 'I'm the black ranger, and your dust', you said. As the wolf-zord finished, preparing his attack, the nighlok was sucked into a red portal and dissapeared. You then joined the other rangers, 'what happened? Where did he go?', you demanded. 'Xandred called him back to the sanzu river, they will heal him and he will come back', jaden said. You then realized how weak you felt, and you collapsed to the ground. 'Brevin? Brevin?, oh god!', you heard Antonio scream, as you reached the ground blacking out.
*Meanwhile, back at the sanzu river* 'Thank you master, for saving me. Next time the black ranger will fall', Treebora said. 'See to it he does, we will cover for your vulnerability to fire next time', Xandred said. 'In the mean time, just heal', Octoroo said.
*Back with the rangers* The rangers were all brimming with worry at your condition. 'He will be stronger next time', Jonie said. 'Brevin or the nighlok?', jaden asked. 'I'm talking about the nighlok', Jonie replied. 'We'll train Brevin then, he has to get stronger to', Antonio said.

(This story takes place in an alternate universe where Merrick is a ranger from the start, no zords ever died thus so hundreds or such zords are on the animarium. And the deer zord was never left behind. But 4 zords are sealed on earth that only the deer zord can find, he will only find them for the new ranger. The 4 zords are, boar, hippopotamus, owl, and raccoon. The story starts with the princess, talking with 5 zords about a 7th ranger. The zords are, deer, gorilla, elephant, and the bear brothers.)

The princess woke with a start, looking at the clock Cole gave her. Its 2:47 am, but the princess could not sleep. She heard cries from outside, so she put on her traditional dress and grabbed a candle. Walking outside, she was surprised to see 5 zords just outside the temple. Her shock turned to fear and concern, when she saw how upset and nervous they seemed. The gorilla zord, reached out and lifted the princess up to the roof.
The princess looked to her zords, she knew they needed to speak with her. "What's wrong dearies? Tell me what's the matter", princess shayla said. The zords look to the princess, then deerzord spoke in zord tongue. The princess could not believe what she heard. "A new ranger? Are you sure?", shayla asked them. Then lights came in from all over the island, some coming from the five zords the princess could see. The lights formed a floating orb, which took on a flowing shape the princess recognized.
"A morpher?", she asked as the zords nodded. They gave her instructions to follow, then left to go back to bed except the deerzord who slept in the yard. The princess was gonna follow the instructions, but one quick issue. She was stuck on the roof, so she needed help. "Merrick! Merrick! Come help me!", she bellowed. "Princess? Princess, where are you?", Merrick called. He saw the princess waving at him, from the roof?!? "Princess, how did you get up there?", Merrick asked. The princess told him what happened, and Merrick was intrigued about the morpher. He fetched the ladder, and helped her down.
The princess approached the sacred water, and dips the new morpher in. The water glowed, and the morpher glowed and gained a look, to befit its new ranger master. "Deerzord said that this morpher, will be he key to obtaining missing animal crystals", shayla said. The water revealed an image of a young human mortal, the princess knew this was the new ranger.
However, the princess had an unwanted visitor. An org spy sent an image of the vision to his master, before heading out on his hover bike. However, gorillazord smashed the hover device from under him. Rhinozord slammed the spy over the edge of the island, sending him to his death.
The next morning, you walked downtown to start your job as a cafe cashier. You don't wanna screw your first day. You turn a corner, and see a bunch of grey creatures! One points at you and you run, you ran straight home. You look out and see them following, its like they knew who you where. 'What is happening', you think. Then suddenly the power rangers started fighting the grey things, out of nowhere!
But what's got you, is one ranger is guiding a women in a white dress and flowery crown towards your house. After they are out of view, you hear your doorbell. You answer and find the ranger, standing at your door. You let him into your house, along with the woman who was holding a box.
The woman tells you, she is a princess who helps the rangers. She says also that, she knows who you are just like the grey creatures. She says you were chosen, to do a special mission. You ask her what it is, why were you chosen and chosen b who?
She smiles sweetly at you. "Well...
1531.title: A new ranger?

15311.content:
"No way, you have the wrong guy. I'm just a cashier for a coffee house, I have almost no skills that qualify me as a ranger. I mean sure, I've got a black belt in karate. But I can't take on such a responsibility, not without thinking first. I gotta go to work now", you told them. The princess was concerned, this was not what she had expected to happen. She left the morpher with a note, on your living room coffee table. "He will come around", she said calmly.
"Princess, is it not strange that we fought no giant monsters today? What aim did those goons have?", asked the red ranger, Cole. The princess simply continued to watch the sacred water, obviously she was troubled. After everyone left, Cole and the princess had been left alone. Cole was bored, he wanted to train. But he also was, worried for the princess and what upsets her. Eventually the princess turned to Cole, she decided to gain his aid.
"Cole, I think I could use your help. There is an urgent matter, I need you to help me", the princess said to Cole. "Then how can I refuse? What do you need of me princess?", Cole asked kindly. "I need you to watch this boy for me . Its very important, the orgs want to harm him." The princess showed Cole the image of you, you were working briskly at the shop. "I don't understand, he seems so normal." "Looks are deceiving Cole, keep an eye on him whenever possible." "Yes princess, as you wish."
You meanwhile, had an excellent first day at work. When you got home, you saw a note on the table. It said, 'if you change your mind the morpher will guide you.' You picked up the morpher. When you did, you heard what seemed like a voice. You reached out to hear it, and you saw bright lights. "I am the deerzord", said the voice. "I must guide you, to find the four crystals of four missing zords."
You left your house, to track down the first crystal: boar. Cole followed you, but lost you at a fork in the road just out of town. He picked the wrong road, as you went to dead oak tree that had a heart shape. You smashed it with your morpher, and reached to pull out a crystal.
Cole was freaking out, he backtracked a mile and saw you running to the river. He followed you, but you had already gotten the crystal for hippopotamus by sticking both hands in the river. But Cole was following orders to keep an eye on you, so he kept running after you. You made a stop, at an abandoned animal nest and pulled your morpher and a light shone from inside the nest. You reached in and a spiritual raccoon, gave you the crystal and a thumbs up.
Cole followed you still, he was wondering what all the running was for. But you were taking a break from running, to climb the tallest tree in turtle cove! Cole reached the clearing the tree was in, after losing track of you again. He decided to climb the tree to look for you, just as you reached the top to see an owl shrine. When you grabbed the crystal, the shrine vanished. You started back down, Cole scrambled down when he saw you to stay out of sight.
The deerzord told you to take the crystals, and go to a cave at the top of a cliff. There, he said the zords would channel their share of power into the morpher. Cole was exhausted, he called the princess and told her how tired he was getting from chasing you all over turtle cove. The princess told him to come back, and get some rest.
Cole passed out in his bed, and the four other rangers asked the princess what he had done.The princess said, Cole was on an important observation mission for her. The rangers asked what it was, but got no answer.
You found the cave around midnight, you went inside to finish what you started. "Place the crystals in the four corners, of the chamber", deerzord said. You followed his instructions, then waited for the next step. Deerzord said to recite a spell, that would transfer the shares of power, and allow the four zords to awaken on the anamarium. "Ancient rangers! The test of the lost four is done, let the light shine on my source of power! Let me walk, in the footsteps of those who came before me!", you shouted.
On the anamarium, the princess saw the 4 lost zords appear. She looked to the deerzord, who nodded to her in confirming. Back in the chamber, 4 white lights flew into your morpher which began to shine brightly. "Good, now you simply must morph, and your are an official ranger. But be warned, if you finish the ritual there is no going back,", deerzord said to you.
"I came this far, I'm finishing what I started! GOLDEN ACCESS!", you shout. On the annimaruim, the princess was walking by the sacred water. Suddenly, a flash of golden light came from the water! The princess knew what was happening, she called and yelled for Merrick and Cole. "Boys, the gold ranger is ready, go find him!", the princess said as the two ran out. But Cole didn't understand what, this was about, what gold ranger?
Meanwhile after you triggered your morpher, things got real trippy. You saw hundreds of glowing animals, running right at you! But each one dissapeared in a flash of golden light, just as they are about to make impact. You meanwhile, had started feeling excruciating pain. It felt like, a mysterious force was trying to explode inside you! Your skin was burning and sizzling, like you were being cooked alive!
A bright light had appeared after you triggered the morphing sequence, but you didn't see it. The light flared through the whole cave, it charged into the sky like a shining pillar. It glowed so brightly it was like a sun, making midnight shine like it was noon. Everyone in turtle cove was awakened by this light, they looked at it in awe. Many were taking video footage or taking photos of the event. Animals, whether tamed or wild panicked. They panicked because the light was so bright, and continued to panic as it would not stop.
Merrick and Cole, looked in wonder at this amazing pillar of light. The princess, as well as the four other rangers had begun looking from the annimarium. The light was amazing, the princess was in wander, the four rangers asked wildly what was happening. Master org meanwhile, was observing the light from his lair. He sent goons out, to get a close look at the light. A small army of goons, about 40 had shone up just as Cole and Merrick were landing.
As soon as Cole and Merrick showed up, the goons were on the attack. Meanwhile, the pain, animals, and lights all stopped and faded. You made your way to the exit quietly. 'No turning back', you thought. Outside, the goons didn't see the light fade nor did Merrick or Cole. But everyone else did. You then stepped out, glowing just like the pillar. Everyone stopped to look at you, so an intro is needed. "Angry boar! Golden ranger.... wild force!", you shout. Then the goons charged, but you weren't running. You went in, charging like a mad beast.
Eventually all the goons were down or retreating, then Cole and Merrick approached you. "So you're the one the princess had me watch right?", Cole asked. You nodded, explaining that deerzord gave you the heads up. You all took off then, heading to the annimarium.
When you arrived, the four other rangers bombarded the lunar and red rangers with questions not seeing you apparently. The princess came out, and she did see you. Once the others did, they were in awe of your golden armor. After de-morphing, you explained your day to everyone. The black ranger commented, saying you had quite the day. You nodded, then passed out.
